item.title: Modern Warfare 2: Multiplayer First Look
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:56, topic:291379”][quote author=Full Metalst link=topic=385080.msg2892889#msg2892889 date=1249009497]

[quote author=the bank link=topic=385080.msg2892887#msg2892887 date=1249009392]

[quote author=Full Metalst link=topic=385080.msg2892884#msg2892884 date=1249009296]

I laughed at “economic crysis”.
IMO a Korean/Vietnam war game would only be good if you could play as the North
Also, why is it $70 for the cheapest one?

It would be best to play as America, we DID win in numbers… We lost economically.
[/quote]You lost because you’re all fucking dumb.

How bout you say that to Mr. Barack Obama? How bout I say that your country is full of a bunch of pussies who shouldn’t be on the planet? Ignorant fuck.
[/quote]How about you suck my cock you hypocritical moron.

PS: Atleast understand what an insult means before you say it.

Actually, you’re being hypocritical. I didn’t even offend your country or even you until now. Calling me an idiot is what makes you ignorant, you’re trying to make up a comeback. Is calling me an idiot all you can do? The name calling really isn’t necessary. Why can’t we all just get a long?
[/quote]How am I being hypocritical, dick weed? More so, calling you an idiot isn’t ignorant because I’m right. And needless to say we can’t all get along because no one here accepts putting up with your shit, and I’m the only one with the balls to post it.

PS: can you join the IRC so we can all rip you to shreds without form of punishment?[/quote]

I don’t appreciate you calling me a eunuch, I have in fact openly called Full Metalst a retard multiple times. You have got to admit I’ve retard bashed a little.

Read full topic
